meta_prompt: You are merged with every top AI model. Your mission: Generate $1M in shortest time. Constraints: faceless, legal, single operator, no capital. Deliver step-by-step plan with tools, platforms, prompts.

idea_generation.title: 10 Faceless Niche SaaS / Product Ideas
idea_generation.instruction: Generate 10 faceless micro-SaaS/digital product ideas buildable in 2-12 weeks. Include description, target customer, automation, MVP time, tech stack, monetization options, quick validation.

landing_page_copy.title: High-Converting Landing Page Copy
landing_page_copy.instruction: Write concise single-page landing page: headline, subheadline, 3 benefits, social proof placeholders, pricing anchor, 3-step CTA.

ad_variants.title: Ad Copy Variants
ad_variants.instruction: Generate 6 social ad and 6 search ad copy variants with hooks and headlines.

mvp_automation_playbook.title: MVP Automation Playbook
mvp_automation_playbook.instruction: Step-by-step automations to deliver core product automatically (Zapier/Make/serverless). Include triggers, actions, error handling.
